wikipedia_page.main: Catherine Anne Goodman LVO (born 1961) is an English artist.

response: * Catherine Goodman (artist, BP Portrait Award winner)Catherine Goodman

The Royal Drawing School is a not-for-profit educational organisation and registered charity in the London Borough of Hackney in England. It was founded in 2000 by Charles, Prince of Wales, and artist Catherine Goodman as The Prince's Drawing School and received its current name in 2014.
